ing: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "A great little pie to impress that special someone. You can use 2 teaspoons rum flavoring in place of the rum if you prefer."
ins:
Beat cream cheese with an electric hand mixer in a large mixing bowl until light and fluffy. Add sweetened condensed milk and lemonade concentrate; beat until smooth. Stir rum and food coloring into the cream cheese mixture. Fold whipped topping with the cream cheese mixture; pour into pie crust.
Refrigerate until filling is firm in the center, about 4 hours.
